Billable vs non - Billable
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Actual Time","WidgetType":"pie","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":100,"WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[{"visible":false,"metricName":"Total","metricValue":"14,450"}]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"SELECT TimeType, [Time]
FROM ( 
    SELECT SUM(v.Billable) AS Billable, SUM(v.NonBillable) AS NonBillable
    FROM ( 
        SELECT SUM(dt.BillableTime) AS Billable, 
				SUM(isnull(dt.AdministrativeTime, 0) + isnull(dt.NewBusinessTime, 0) + isnull(dt.InternalWorkTime, 0)) AS NonBillable
        FROM Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) dt
		WHERE dt.[Date] BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) and
						(dt.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
						(dt.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
						(dt.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
                        and (dt.[ClientId] = @Client or @Client = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
                        and (dt.[ProjectId] = @Project or @Project = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
                        and (dt.[JobId] = @Job or @Job = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
        UNION ALL 
        SELECT 0.0 as Billable, 
				SUM(dl.[Hours]) AS NonBillable
        FROM Analytics.Leave(@CurrentUserId) dl
		WHERE dl.[Date] BETWEEN @FromDate AND DATEADD(day, 1, @ToDate) and
						(dl.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
						(dl.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
						(dl.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
		) v
	) pvt UNPIVOT ([Time] FOR TimeType IN (pvt.Billable, pvt.NonBillable) 
) AS unpvt
where [Time] != 0","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["startDate","endDate","Company","Division","Department","Client","Project","Job"]}}]
